name: addCategoryToChannel
shortDescription: Adds a category to a channel
description: This method adds a category to a channel.
signatures: Boolean addCategoryToDevice(Integer peerId, Integer channel, Integer categoryId)

parameters.name: peerId
parameters.description: The ID of the peer to add the category to.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel of the peer to add the category to.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The ID of the category as returned by createCategory() or getCategories().

returnValue: Returns true on success and false if something went wrong (e. g. unknown channel).
